contents:
iis設定Cookie HttpOnly 在web.config已經增加下面，卻還是沒效
<system.web><httpCookies httpOnlyCookies="true"/></system.web>查到VB classic可以在<system.webServer>增加rewrite module
<system.webServer><rewrite> ​<outboundRules> ​<rule name="Add HttpOnly" preCondition="No HttpOnly"> ​<match serverVariable="RESPONSE_Set_Cookie" pattern=".*" negate="false" /> ​<action type="Rewrite" value="{R:0}; HttpOnly" /> ​<conditions> ​</conditions> ​</rule> ​<preConditions> ​<preCondition name="No HttpOnly"> ​<add input="{RESPONSE_Set_Cookie}" pattern="." /> ​<add input="{RESPONSE_Set_Cookie}" pattern="; HttpOnly" negate="true" /> ​</preCondition> ​</preConditions> ​</outboundRules> ​</rewrite></system.webServer>增加rewrite module前要先下載 https://www.iis.net/downloads/microsoft/url-rewrite
可以使用Free Web Platform Installer或拉到下面Download URL Rewrite Module 2.1選擇版本
此版本 Works With: IIS 7, IIS 7.5, IIS 8, IIS 8.5, IIS 10
只要是正版OS都可以下載
※rewrite module從IIS 7開始支援
title: VB classic回應封包設HttpOnly

contents:
javax.net.sslSSLPeerUnverfiedException:peer not authenticated 原本網站配置為jdk6與TLS1.0
改為jdk8與TLS1.2，tomcat則是未升級
網路上查詢jdk6用SSLv2，jdk8用TLSv1
title: peer not authenticated
